definition[0]: something that you are given free, usually by a company
example[0]: A waiter was handing round freebie glasses of wine.
example[1]: The company paid for the minister to fly out to Australia on a freebie.
definition[1]: something that you are given free, for example to encourage you to buy more of the same thing or to buy something else
example[2]: You get three freebies for every 20 cases of soda purchased.
